question: all teachers are female and all students are female but so far from religion in such a case is it allowed me to go in such colleges
answer:
QUESTION

i am doing BA from girls college my will is to do ba private but my parents insists me to take admission in college and go  regularly as u know thecompany in colleges are not good and nonmahram persons such as clerks &guardiansare also present in  colleges all teachers are female and all students are female but so far from religion in such a case is it allowed me to go in such colleges??as i tell u all my problems

ANSWER


Share:

Allah has created everyone uniquely. Every person’s thinking process and mindset is different.

One should reason with one’s parents on this issue, spelling out to them the pros and cons of the matter. They should be explained the importance of Hayaa and modesty in Islam. A lot of du’aa should be made to Allah to soften their hearts and make them more sensitive to Islamic ethos and values. Insha Allah, Allah will open their hearts to your religious concerns.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
